sensorthings.components.observations package

Submodules

sensorthings.components.observations.engine module

class sensorthings.components.observations.engine.ObservationBaseEngine

Bases: object

Abstract base class for handling Observations.

This class defines the required methods for managing observations. These methods must be implemented to allow the SensorThings API to interface with an underlying database.

abstract create_observation(observation)

Create a new observation.

Parameters:

observation (dict) – The observation data to be created.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created observation.

Return type:

str

abstract delete_observation(observation_id)

Delete an observation.

Parameters:

observation_id (str) – The ID of the observation to delete.

Return type:

None

abstract get_observations(observation_ids=None, datastream_ids=None, feature_of_interest_ids=None, pagination=None, ordering=None, filters=None, expanded=False)

Retrieve observations based on provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • observation_ids (List[str], optional) – List of observation IDs to filter the results.

  • datastream_ids (List[str], optional) – List of datastream IDs to filter the results.

  • feature_of_interest_ids (List[str], optional) – List of feature of interest IDs to filter the results.

  • pagination (dict, optional) – Pagination information to limit the number of results.

  • ordering (dict, optional) – Ordering information to sort the results.

  • filters (dict, optional) – Additional filters to apply to the query.

  • expanded (bool, optional) – Whether to include expanded information in the results.

Return type:

(Dict[str, dict], int)

Returns:

  • Dict[str, dict] – A dictionary of observations, keyed by their IDs.

  • int – The total number of observations matching the query.

abstract update_observation(observation_id, observation)

Update an existing observation.

Parameters:

  • observation_id (str) – The ID of the observation to update.

  • observation (dict) – The updated observation data.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.components.observations.schemas module

class sensorthings.components.observations.schemas.Observation(**data)

Bases: BaseComponent, ObservationFields, ObservationRelations

A schema representing an observation.

This class combines the fields and relations of an observation, and extends the BaseComponent class.

class sensorthings.components.observations.schemas.ObservationFields(**data)

Bases: Schema

A schema representing the fields of an observation.

phenomenon_time

The time when the observation phenomenon occurred.

Type:

Union[ISOTimeString, ISOIntervalString]

result

The result of the observation.

Type:

float

result_time

The time when the observation result was generated.

Type:

Union[ISOTimeString, None], optional

result_quality

The quality of the observation result.

Type:

dict

valid_time

The time period during which the observation result is valid.

Type:

Union[ISOIntervalString, None], optional

parameters

Additional parameters for the observation.

Type:

dict
